<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t AllocBlocks = NumBlocks - NumFreeBlocks;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t OldBlockCount = FreeBlocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#abf86e1383aec181a5a2d9967eb8070fd">size</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t NewBlockCount = AllocBlocks + OldBlockCount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t NextFpmBlock = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(OldBlockCount, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/tarwriter-cpp/#aac035f4156e2604bfa42ba22c17b83ee">BlockSize</a>) + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">    FreeBlocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#a32859a24aa7a3be269855b989d92a4b4">resize</a>(NewBlockCount, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we crossed over an fpm page, we actually need to allocate 2 extra</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// blocks for each FPM group crossed and mark both blocks from the group as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// used.  FPM blocks are marked as allocated regardless of whether or not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// they ultimately describe the status of blocks in the file.  This means</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that not only are extraneous blocks at the end of the main FPM marked as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// allocated, but also blocks from the alternate FPM are always marked as</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NextFpmBlock &lt; NewBlockCount) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/msfbuilder/#af4a2024c4c2cee5d75b2146a5bc544d4"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/msfbuilder/#af4a2024c4c2cee5d75b2146a5bc544d4">MSFBuilder::addStream</a>(uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a> Blocks) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add a new stream mapped to the specified blocks.  Verify that the specified</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// blocks are both necessary and sufficient for holding the requested number</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of bytes, and verify that all requested blocks are free.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ReqBlocks != Blocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we&#39;re growing, we have to allocate new Blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::vector&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt; AddedBlockList;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For shrinking, free all the Blocks in the Block map, update the stream</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t RemovedBlocks = OldBlocks - NewBlocks;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BlockSize) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 8192:</span></CodeLine>
